name: Order of Ataxia: Initial Effects
description: With the gods of the planescape threatening eternal punishment, it is up to Doctor Charles Malcom and his overseer from the gods, Fallore, to fix the wrongs of his experiments. At the heart of his last clean-up is a core being fought over by an elven thief, a stoic mage, and a loyal handmaiden!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
